metadata.project: King Follett Discourse - Digital Critical Edition
metadata.description: Fuzzy paragraph-level alignment of four eyewitness accounts
metadata.alignment_method: Manual thematic segmentation based on content analysis
metadata.notes: Each section represents a thematic unit of the discourse. Page references use the original manuscript pagination. 'om.' indicates the witness omits this section entirely.

sections.summary: The spirit of man has no beginning or end (ring analogy). If it had a beginning it would have an end. God never had power to create the spirit of man.

sections.label: God Instituted Laws for Lesser Intelligences
